title: Cinnamon sultana bread
ingredients: ['175ml (6 fl oz) warm water', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '15g (1/2 oz) butter', '350g (12 oz) plain flour', '3 tablespoons dried milk powder', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 dessertspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '50g (2 oz) sultanas']
